title: E 永續園區-建構永續經營與優質投資環境
content: 中科管理局將園區３ 大永續願景展開為 16 項推動措施，透過檢視園區涉及之業務與T-SDGs 間的相關性，將各組室業務明確對應重大核心目標，並主責辦理相關推動工作，不定期以會議及公文信件討論工作執行進度，再於管審會議中彙報相關執行成果。
en_title: E Sustainable Park Building a sustainable management and high-quality investment environment
en_content: CTSP Bureau expands the three sustainable visions of the park into 16 promotion measures. By examining the correlation between the businesses involved in the park and T-SDGs, it corresponds the business of each room to the major core goals, and is mainly responsible for handling the relevant promotion work, discussing the implementation progress of the work through meetings and official letters from time to time, and then reporting the relevant implementation results at the management review meeting.
